text: Great news, you can start using babel6 in ember
what's good about babel6? Haven't been keeping up on that.

tl;dr; 
- It is maintained and gets new features, babel5 doesn't.
- Those new features include newer ES2016/2017/2018 features
- Even existing features get some improvements, like being transpiled to more performant code
- It's plugin system is faster because does everything all the transpilation in a single pass.
- Ember's implementation includes babel-preset-env, which in combination with the targets RFC (<https://github.com/ember-cli/rfcs/blob/master/active/0095-standardise-targets.md>) makes your app only transpile what is needed depending on the browsers you support
